inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of migraine, chronic or episodic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Consent to participate in the CHUM Migraine Clinic IMPACT project
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 15 or more headache days per month
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients whom first headache diagnosis is not migraine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women with ongoing or planned pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with an active psychiatric condition (needing hospitalisation or psychosis)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with mental retardation impairing assessment or follow-up
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with an active medical condition which may lead to frequent hospitalisations
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: head CT showed a significant amount of blood in her right ventricle, but no indication of frequent hospitalizations

exclusion.criterion: Active follow-up at a pain clinic
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient speaking a language other than french and incapable to communicate in a reliable way
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient presented with a severe 'exploding' headache following a head injury. She was diagnosed with an AVM and had improving headaches with pain medication.
